::Lord Elder::
 
Elder was taken back by Legacy's knowledge of him but=
 decides to dismiss it for now.
 
Elder: I realize that. We owe you a =
great bit of gratitude. The Minions had attacked the Maximal city of Atlant=
is and cause much destruction. They even stole the greatest power we can kn=
ow from us. We have come to try and recapture some of that power.
 
El=
der was being vague on purpose.
 
Elder: May I ask of your origin? I a=
m quite surprised to find a Transformer guarding the Ark in this era.

--- =
On Fri, 6/6/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From=
: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: At The Ark
To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, June 6, 2008, 5:05 PM







 
>=
 The Maximal shuttle lands outside Mt. St. Hillary.

The black and crimson =
tank halted in its forward movement as the Minions faded from even his pier=
cing sensors. Weapons systems powered down as its weapons assumed a neutral=
 position. 

Even as the shuttle came to a landing small sensors dishes tur=
ned to orient on the vehicle, but the tank made other overt movement. 

&gt=
; Elder: Well at least the Minion presence was detured. Now to find out 
&g=
t; the story with this tank Transformers. Weapons ready. Back me up.
> 
=
> Elder exits the shuttle, looking to the Ark's tank defender.
> 
&gt=
; Elder: Hello there. I am Lord Elder of The Watchers and currently 
> r=
epresenting the Maximals. We wish no harm to the Ark or our 
> ancestors=
...

As Elder exited the shuttle the tank shifted form, the plates and stru=
ts of the unknown being seeming to leap and shift as the former tank seemed=
 more to reformat itself rather than transform into its towering robotic mo=
de. 

Turning as he assumed this new mode the newcomer=92s icy cyclopean ga=
ze locked onto Elder, =93CONFIRMED: YOU ARE LORD ELDER, COMMANDER OF THE WA=
TCHERS.=94 The voice that emanated from the being was cold and emotionless,=
 yet the power of it reverberated across the distance between the two. =93H=
OWEVER YOUR LAST STATEMENT WOULD APPEAR FLAWED. HAD I NOT INTERVENED YOU WO=
ULD HAVE ARRIVED TOO LATE TO PROTECT THE ARK, THE REPERCUSSIONS OF WHICH WO=
ULD HAVE PROVEN CATASTROPHIC.=94

(TAG)

OOC: Welcome to the fun! I had Leg=
acy know about Elder=92s leadership of the Watchers on purpose, although on=
 the wiki site it is not suppose to be well known. 

Also Legacy is on the =
wiki site under the independents, but I did not add that much info since no=
t much has been revealed yet. 

Again feel free to throw stuff at me on or =
off list. 

Preston
(Legacy)
